name: StanÇact: Sexy Tenacious Girls
summary: 『StanÇact』is a cute and sexy girl-on-girl Shoot'em up. Mai, a military officer, is on her way to quell a riot, but the rioters and the military have teamed up and are on the rampage and the head of the military was the ringleader.Witness one woman's struggle to complete her mission amidst the chaos!
